I am a professional Data Scientist with 6+ years of experience building small to large end-to-end data science solutions. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Math and a Master's degree in Data Analytics and Management. My interests are data science (machine learning, deep learning, Bayesian methods, time series modeling, stochastic processes & quantitative finance, topological data analysis, image & text processing), chaos theory (dynamical systems, simulation, system identification), and numerical analysis.

As a data scientist, I offer a range of services to help clients extract value from their data. I have a strong understanding of statistical and mathematical concepts and I am proficient in using the latest tools and technologies to deliver high-quality results. My services are tailored to meet the specific needs of my clients and I am dedicated to helping them achieve their goals.
